sqls.sql: SELECT cr_rtn_h_id, sn_no, sn_type, sn_type_name, invp_no, invp_name, cr_rtn_sn_rmk1, cr_rtn_sn_rmk2, cr_rtn_sn_rmk3, cr_rtn_sn_rmk4, cr_rtn_sn_rmk5, cr_rtn_sn_rmk6, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM cr_rtn_sn WHERE cr_rtn_sn_id = @cr_rtn_sn_id;
